about_the_game:
Your time has come to join the family business - become a postman! Take this prestigious position and don't let your family down, they are counting on you!
Take control of the post office and serve the customers:

  • Receive and send parcels and letters

  • Maintain order in the warehouse

  • Satisfy customer demands

And your career will soar!

Keep an eye on shipments. There might be illegal goods hidden in each parcel. Inspect, scan, open, and weigh the parcels. Only you decide what to send and what not to.
Every day, you will receive a set of rules for sending parcels. Follow them to avoid getting fired!

The mafia, smugglers, and the police – everyone wants to cooperate with you. Send forbidden goods or turn in the mafia boss? Only you decide which side to take. Any decision may have serious consequences
